Key Match Events: England won by 10 wickets (with 62 balls remaining)
Pre-Game Insights: USA look to thwart England's charge towards semi-finals
England may be unchanged for the third match running
USA have been without Monank since their group-stage win over Pakistan, but head coach Stuart Law suggested he was close to returning from a shoulder injury
Miscellaneous Highlights: The forecast for Sunday has improved although there is still a chance of rainfall interrupting proceedings
This will be the first meeting between England and USA with full international status in any format
Sam Curran needs one more wicket to reach 50 in T20Is
Others: England's cushion comes from their convincing win over the other co-hosts West Indies at the start of the Super Eight
